ygData.subject: Re: re: Duster Models
ygData.msgSnippet: I can confrim this as I completed the duster quest last night and got the Bootstrutters Pack (Isn t the Gnome who gives you the Jboots quest named
ygData.messageBody:
I can confrim this as I completed the duster quest last night and got the
Bootstrutters Pack (Isn't the Gnome who gives you the Jboots quest named
Bootstrutter? Heh - anyone try giving him his pack back? Just an idea).

These junk items that you talk about - I've never seen them before.
Gnomish Glow Rods? Perhaps these are the rods needed for the thermal
cloak... I just received a patchwork cloak after completing the Red V
quest - I'll try to do the Duster and scrap metal quests a few more times
to get these Rods and try a few combinations.

QdP

"Quasinom de Plume is my quasi nom-de-plume"

> Duster V is still a rare spawn around the enterence.
> Duster X now only spawns once you turn in the report, he spawns down by
> the
> tinkering merchant, and doesnt wander anymore, he just stands in place.
> I did this quest once (and am waiting for Duster V to do it again) and
> got the
> Bootstrutters Pack, 10slot backpack with 10% weight reduction..
> A lot of the junk that you used to get for this quest (back when Dustre
> X was a
> wandering rare spawn) can now also be gotten by turning in scrap metal
> from
> rogues to Sanfryd Feathertop (who used to be called Sanfryd
> somethingelse).
> Amongst the normal lanterns/shield junk you can also get gnomish glow
> rods, and
> chunks of metal ore that look like balls instead of bricks...
>
> Getting the duster report seems to be less common than it used to be as
> well - I
> get the Red V report a lot more now, previously it was the other way
> around..
>
>
>
